review: It is a great little gadget.  Don't know how we managed all this time without it.  We have 2 of these; one in the living room and one in the kitchen.  We can stream netflix or the amazon prime shows etc.  We haven't explored any of the other forums but will in time.  There were a few glitches in the begininning with the wifi password being dropped and having to re-enter but we haven't had that issue in a while.  I would highly recommend this as it broadens up your viewing capacity.  I've seen more documentaries in the past few weeks than I have in years.
